entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 7.3°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
